article_metadata.description: How bad is income inequality? The answer can be seen in the share of national income going to providers of “capital” (owners, shareholders).
article_metadata.sailthru.description: A brilliant new paper by a little-known economist explains who’s doing well and why. No, it isn’t Thomas Piketty.
